mapper.sql: user_id, user_name, password, phone_num, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time, is_delete, version
mapper.insert: insert into m_user_info (user_id, user_name, password, phone_num, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time, is_delete, version) values (#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phoneNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into m_user_info
user_id,
user_name,
password,
phone_num,
create_user,
create_time,
update_user,
update_time,
is_delete,
version,

#{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update m_user_info
user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone_num = #{phoneNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER},
version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update m_user_info set user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone_num = #{phoneNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER}, version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER} where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT muser.user_id, muser.user_name, muser.phone_num, CONCAT_WS(':',dictType.dict_type_desc,uattr.attr_id) AS attr_id, CONCAT_WS(':',dict.dict_name,uattr.attr_value) AS attr_value FROM m_user_info muser LEFT JOIN t_user_attr uattr ON muser.user_id = uattr.user_id LEFT JOIN t_dict_data dict ON uattr.attr_value = dict.dict_value AND uattr.attr_id = dict.dict_type LEFT JOIN t_dict_type dictType ON uattr.attr_id = dictType.dict_type WHERE muser.is_delete = 0 AND uattr.is_delete = 0 AND dict.is_delete = 0 AND dict.is_enable = 0 AND dictType.is_delete = 0 AND dictType.is_enable = 0 AND muser.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY muser.user_id, uattr.attr_id

SELECT customer.user_id, customer.user_name, customer.phone_num, CONCAT_WS(':',dictType.dict_type_desc,uattr.attr_id) AS attr_id, CONCAT_WS(':',dict.dict_name,uattr.attr_value) AS attr_value FROM m_user_info muser, t_customer_relation relation LEFT JOIN m_user_info customer ON relation.customer_id = customer.user_id LEFT JOIN t_user_attr uattr ON customer.user_id = uattr.user_id LEFT JOIN t_dict_data dict ON uattr.attr_id = dict.dict_type LEFT JOIN t_dict_type dictType ON uattr.attr_id = dictType.dict_type WHERE muser.is_delete = 0 AND customer.is_delete = 0 AND uattr.is_delete = 0 AND dict.is_delete = 0 AND dict.is_enable = 0 AND dictType.is_delete = 0 AND dictType.is_enable = 0 AND muser.user_id = relation.user_id AND relation.is_relation = 0 AND muser.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY muser.user_id, customer.user_id, uattr.attr_id
